Endearingly known as the "Queen of Arabian Sea", the tiny town caters to both domestic and international tourists owing to its world-class bea (Read More)ches, tea estates, spices plantations and backwaters. The coastline gives rise to some of the finest harbours and in numerous beautiful beaches in Kochi. Kochi is a perfect blend of history and modernity. So, if you are in Kochi, make sure you visit the immaculate beaches, try its spicy cuisine and just soak in the Kochi vibe. Here is the list of 11 11 Surreal Beaches in Kochi for a Perfect Vacation 1. Cherai Beach 4.3 /5 View 6+ photos Cherai Beach, located on the northern end of Vypin Island in Kerala, is a perfect blend of sea and backwaters rimmed by lush greenery and beautiful paddy fields. With its golden sands and clear blue waters, the beach is a popular spot for swimming and sunbathing. Dolphin sightings are frequent here, adding another layer of charm to the already picturesque setting.Location: Vypin Island, Kerala.Famous For: Dolphin sightingsDistance from Kochi: 33.9 kms Read More 2. Puthuvype Beach - Stunning lighthouse! 4.0 /5 Situated near the city of Kochi, Puthuvype Beach is a tranquil and picturesque destination that attracts both locals and tourists. Characterized by its vast expanse of golden sands and calm azure waters, the beach provides an ideal setting for relaxation. The Puthuvype Lighthouse, located close to the beach, offers panoramic views of the Arabian Sea and is a major attraction.Location: Near Kochi, Kerala.Famous For: Its serene ambiance and the nearby Puthuvype Lighthouse.Distance from Kochi: 16.8 kms Read More 3. Marari Beach 4.2 /5 Located in the Alappuzha district of Kerala, Marari Beach is a pristine paradise known for its tranquil ambiance and unspoiled coastline. Its name is derived from "Mararikulam," a local fishing village, highlighting the beach's close connection to traditional Kerala culture. The palm-fringed shores and golden sands provide a perfect backdrop for relaxation and rejuvenation.Location: Alappuzha, Kerala.Famous For: Its untouched beauty and closeness to traditional fishing communities.Distance from Kochi: 40.7 kms Read More 4. Kuzhuppilly Beach - A Hidden Gem Situated near Vypin Island in Kerala, Kuzhuppilly Beach is a lesser-known gem offering serene environs away from the bustling crowds. With its coconut palm-fringed shoreline and gentle waves, it's a preferred spot for both locals and tourists seeking solace and tranquility. The beach also offers splendid sunset views, making it a picturesque spot for evening relaxation.Location: Near Vypin Island, Kochi, Kerala.Famous For: Serenity, pristine beauty, and enchanting sunset views.Distance from Kochi: 29.9 kms Read More Kochi Travel Packages Compare quotes from upto 3 travel agents for free 5 Nights / 6 Days Kerala Package Itinerary with Houseboat Experience Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Alleppey(1N) → Kochi(1N) ₹ 16,999 11% off ₹14,999/person Get Offers> 7 Nights / 8 Days Marvellous Kerala Tour Package for 7 Nights 8 Days Kochi(1N) → Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Alleppey(1N) → Ko... ₹ 28,470 11% off ₹25,185/person Get Offers> 5 Nights / 6 Days Romantic 5N/6D Monsoon Honeymoon Package Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Alleppey(1N) → Kochi(1N) Sold By: Jonjes Holidays(4.7 ) ₹ 20,000 7% off ₹18,500/person Get Offers> 6 Nights / 7 Days Kerala Tour Package with Kumarakom and Houseboat Stay Kochi(1N) → Munnar(2N) → Kumarakom(2N) → Alappuzha(1N) ₹28,900/person Get Offers> 4 Nights / 5 Days Alleppry Munnar Kochi Tour Package for 4 Nights Kochi(1N) → Munnar(2N) → Alleppey(1N) Sold By: Zoom Yatra Holidays Pvt Ltd(5.0 ) ₹ 12,000 12% off ₹10,500/person Get Offers> 8 Nights / 9 Days Romantic 9 Days Kerala Honeymoon Holiday Package Kochi(1N) → Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(2N) → Alappuzha (1N) &rar... Fort Kochi Beach Fort Kochi Beach, with its colonial charm and historic remnants, is a popular destination in Kochi, Kerala. The beach is adorned with Chinese fishing nets that have become an iconic symbol of the region. Walking along its shores, one can witness the blend of cultures, from Portuguese to Dutch, reflected in the surrounding architecture and streets.Location: Fort Kochi, Kochi, Kerala.Famous For: Historical significance, Chinese fishing nets, colonial architecture.Distance from Kochi: 6 kms Read More 6. Puthenthode Beach Puthenthode Beach is a serene and relatively lesser-known beach in Kerala, making it an ideal escape for those looking to avoid crowded tourist spots. Its unspoiled beauty, lined with swaying coconut trees, offers a tranquil atmosphere for relaxation and contemplation. The gentle waves and golden sands make it a lovely spot for beachcombers and sunset watchers.Location: Puthenthode, Kerala.Famous For: Serenity, unspoiled beauty, and coconut tree-lined shores.Distance from Kochi: 9 kms Read More 7. Veeranpuzha Beach Veeranpuzha Beach is an extension of the Vembanad Lake, the longest lake in India. This tranquil beach, with its serene backwaters, attracts many visitors seeking solace away from the hustle of city life. Fishermen's boats dotting the horizon and traditional fishing methods offer a glimpse into the local way of life.Location: Veeranpuzha, Kerala.Famous For: Its serene backwaters, traditional fishing, and connection to Vembanad Lake.Distance from Kochi: 29kms Read More 8. Andhakaranazhi Beach, Kochi 4.2 /5 Andhakaranazhi Beach is a hidden gem located near Kochi, offering picturesque views of the Arabian Sea. It serves as a serene getaway, providing a delightful contrast to the bustling city life of Kochi. The pristine sandy shores, coconut groves, and a quaint lighthouse are major attractions for both tourists and locals.Location: Near Kochi, Kerala.Famous For: Its untouched beauty, the lighthouse, and tranquil environment.Distance from Kochi: 40 kms Read More 9. Munambam Beach Munambam Beach, situated at the confluence of the Periyar River and the Arabian Sea, is one of Kochi's serene getaways. The vast expanse of sandy shoreline, frequented by local fishermen, offers visitors a chance to witness the daily life of the community. The beach's pristine environment and scenic sunsets make it a favorite spot for picnics and relaxation.Location: Near Kochi, Kerala.Famous For: Its serene environment, scenic sunsets, and local fishing activities.Distance from Kochi: 38 kms Read More 10. Marine Drive 4.2 /5 View 20+ photos Marine Drive is not exactly a beach, but a picturesque promenade in Kochi, stretching along the backwaters. It's a popular hangout spot for locals and tourists alike, offering a beautiful view of the setting sun against the backdrop of the serene backwaters. The walkway, dotted with numerous shopping outlets, eateries, and coffee shops, provides an ambient environment for relaxation and leisure strolls.Location: Kochi, Kerala.Famous For: Scenic backwater views, vibrant walkway, and boat rides.Distance from Kochi: 7.8 kms Read More 11. Willingdon Island Beach 4.2 /5 Willingdon Island is one of the largest man-made islands in India, located in Kochi. It plays a pivotal role in the region's port trade and houses several government establishments, luxury hotels, and commercial centers. Though not traditionally a "beach" destination, its shores offer serene views of the backwaters and proximity to Kochi's maritime activities.Location: Kochi, Kerala.Famous For: Its historical significance, port activities, and luxury accommodations.Distance from Kochi: 6 kms Read More The beaches in Kochi are stimulating to the senses in terms of their cuisine, warm waters and stunning views.
